summary:
Fortnite is a super popular video game with different versions. It was made by Epic Games and came out in 2017. The most famous version is *Fortnite Battle Royale*, where up to 100 players fight until one person wins. Another version, *Save the World*, is about defending against zombies. *Fortnite Creative* lets players make their own game worlds.

The game is free and has made a lot of money, with millions of players. It's available on many devices, like phones, computers, and game consoles.
title: Fortnite
